page.title: 01About Our Block
page.content: Our block contains much of the town of Burton upon Trent, including its commercial centre, together with large areas of industrial and residential land. Burton is a small town (pop. 50,000) with its roots in the brewing industry. Today only Allied Breweries and Bass, together with three smaller breweries, represent this traditional industry in a town where once existed many brewing establishments. Other industries present include tyre manufacture, metal castings, light and heavy engineering and timber products. In the recently constructed shopping precinct most major chain stores are represented, and there is discussion of further expansion. This is a historic year for the town, with the completion of the long-awaited second river crossing.
